title: Strengthening Software Development Practice Competencies: Design and Implementation of a Customized Science Curriculum Based on CBETC

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the definition and goals of CBETC with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can write an activity plan for personalized instructional design.
Learners can develop a science lesson module integrating diverse teaching methods.
Learners can design an assessment rubric applying a mastery-based progress management system.
Learners can establish a learner feedback system based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
